notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceived and designed the experiments: W.H., X.Z., S.S. Performed the experiments: W.H., X.Z., J.S., R.Y., Y.Z. Analyzed the experiments: W.H., X.Z., S.S. Contributed reagents/materials: J.S., R.Y., Y.Z. Wrote the paper: W.H., X.Z., S.S. All authors read and approved the manuscript.
